熅字的基本解释

熅
yūn
同“煴”

熅
yǔn
同“煴”。

熅字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yūn］
［《廣韻》於云切，平文，影。］
亦作“煾2”。“熅1”的新字形。
(1)郁烟，不见火焰的燃烧而产生出来的许多烟。
(2)微火；无焰的火。
(3)温暖；暖和。
(4)温和；宽容。
[②]［yùn］
［《集韻》紆問切，去焮，影。］
“熅2”的新字形。
用烙铁或熨斗烫平衣物。

熅字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　熅； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页679第04
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?於云切，音氳。【說文】鬱煙也。【前漢·蘇武傳】置熅火。【註】師古曰：熅聚火無焱者也。　又【玉篇】煙熅也，氣也，煗也。【班固·東都賦】降烟熅調元氣。　又【新書·道術篇】欣?可安謂之熅。反熅爲鷙。　又通作蘊。【詩·大雅】蘊隆蟲蟲。【釋文】蘊行粉反。本又作熅。紆文反。　又【集韻】烏昆切，音溫。?熅火微。或作熄。　又鄔本切，音穩。熅㶧熱也。　又紆問切，音醞。以火伸物。　又烏沒切，音搵。煙鬱貌。　又一曰熱貌。【新書·禮篇】天淸澈，地富熅。

熅字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
熅字的起名意思

暂无。

iron
Basic explanation of words
iron
yūn
Same as "sizzling"
iron
yǔn
Same as "scorching".
iron
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yūn］
["Guangyun" Yu Yunqie, plain text, shadow. ]
Also known as "Yuan 2". The new glyph of "熅1".
(1) Fume is full of smoke, not seeing a lot of smoke produced by the burning of flames.
(2) Microfire; flameless fire.
(3) Warm; warm.
(4) Gentle; tolerant.
[②]［yùn］
["Ji Yun" asks and cuts, goes to Yan, film. ]
The new glyph of "熅2".
Use a soldering iron or iron to iron the clothes.
iron

[Si Collection] [Fire Word Department] 　熅; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 679 04
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Yu Yunqie, Yin Feng. [Said Wen] Yu Yan also. [Previous Han·Su Wu Biography] Set the fire. [Note] Shi Gu said: People who gather together and have no flames.　[Jade Chapter] Smoke, qi, and simmer. 【Ban Gu·Dong Du Fu】Reduce smoke and strengthen vitality.　[New Book·Daoshu Articles] Xin? It can be said to be very hot. Anti-squatting is a bird of prey.　It is also known as Zuoyun. 【Poetry·Daya】Yunlong insects. [Explanation] Yun Xing Fan Anti. Ben made another 熅.纡文反。　[Jiyun] Ukunchi, sound temperature. ? Stir the fire slightly. Or put it out.　 Wu Benqie again, the sound is steady. It's hot too.　 Asked about it again, the sound was brewing. Extend things with fire.　There is no cut, sound. Smokey appearance.　Another said hot appearance. 【New Book·Rituals】The sky is clear and the earth is rich.
